Does anyone know of a way to integrate goToWebinar with the forms tool in HubSpot? Not at the landing page or webpage level but at the form level?
I believe they have an integration no?
yeah they do - typically you set it up at the landing page level or webpage level

didn’t know if there was a way to do this at the form tool level. The reason that I need this is because I’m using HubDB to generate the pages so setting up the webinar at the form level is essential.
<@U25C65C3S> So how can i add here if am doing as landing page?

I have a question about using the *Content Staging* in HubSpot.
Do live pages that get replaced through the *Content Staging* tool retain their Report data (ie: when you view the page's performance tab with views/submissions/etc)?

I've just finished a test on a live page, and in the Content Staging Log it says "replaced" leading me to believe so, but this was a brand new page, published and even hit the live url a few times before going through the content staging. It looks like report data however is only populated maybe once per day or something and not like a "live" update.

Content staging in HS works like this:

When you create a staged version of a page, it essentially clones the page, when you go to publish the page live, the old version of the page gets archived, the new page sucks in all the analytics from the old page and gets published at the same URL.
and yes I think the stats are not up to the minute current

perfect, thanks for that clarification <@U7SL518D6>.
I figured that was the case, but didn't want to assume and risk losing our reporting (our marketing team would've been quite upset if that happened lol) on a live page for our site redesign with new templates and content.
You’re far more cautious than I was the first time I attempted to use staging <@UAQHN1F2Q> - I think I blew up a few pages on a client portal before realizing what was going on
hahah, yeah, had it happen once before and have taken whatever precautions I can to avoid that happening again
I learned the hard way how staging works behind the scenes while it was still beta, boy that was a mess. But glad I know now that it does that.
Anyone having a hard time creating CTAs?
It looks like if I add custom styling to the button like margin -4 REM it doesn't allow me to save but if I remove that it saves fine

Yes :see_no_evil: 

Have been having a difficult time adding CTA’s (when trying to get them into email’s context), styling the CTA is almost near to impossible as the HubSpot seems to make “no link CTA” when inserted as text into an image, which design-wise doesn’t look good.  Styling a css or a template didn’t work so CTAs are something I dislike in some ways since trying to personalize them seems to be a pain in the ass :thinking_face:

Question, I know awhile (long while) back there was a issue where some ad blocker flagged HS content on a site and caused major issues. Was there anything that came about of that like a TOS update or anything like that?

We can't really control what a third party ad blocker does, however with content moving towards being served from the hosting domain rather than a single HubSpot domain, the likelihood of this happening again is low unless they blanket ban all CTA wrapper classes.
